ValidationRule.description: Only the Peer Reviewer can set the Peer Reviewer Approved field to "Yes" Updated 11/5/2019 Per NICC-038406
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'Hosted RFC',RecordType.Name = 'HRM RFC',RecordType.Name = 'PMS RFC'), ISPICKVAL(Peer_Reviewer_Approved__c, "Yes"), (ISCHANGED(Peer_Reviewer_Approved__c)), (ISBLANK( Peer_Reviewer__c) || $User.Id <> Peer_Reviewer__c ), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator')
/* ORIGINAL CODE (RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && ISPICKVAL(Peer_Reviewer_Approved__c, "Yes") && (ISCHANGED(Peer_Reviewer_Approved__c)) && (ISBLANK( Peer_Reviewer__c) || $User.Id <> Peer_Reviewer__c )) && $User.ProfileId <> '00e30000000mGqr' */
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the Peer Reviewer can set the Peer Reviewer Approved field to "Yes"
